mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATBOTS (session_seq,mem_id, contents, bot_answer, creat_at) VALUES (#{chatbot.session_seq},#{chatbot.mem_id}, #{chatbot.contents}, #{chatbot.bot_answer}, #{chatbot.creat_at})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(chat_seq), mem_id, session_seq, MAX(CASE WHEN contents IS NOT NULL THEN contents ELSE NULL END) AS contents, MAX(CASE WHEN creat_at IS NOT NULL THEN creat_at ELSE NULL END) AS creat_at, MAX(CASE WHEN bot_answer IS NOT NULL THEN bot_answer ELSE NULL END) AS bot_answer FROM CHATBOTS WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} GROUP BY session_seq, mem_id ORDER BY MAX(creat_at) DESC;
